AD_Idle.synopsis: Back and forth - Guard 1 complaining about goblins drinking so much, Guard 2 telling her to lighten up. They're discussing a set of adventurers who tried to sneak into the temple - and the revenge they're planning.

AD_Idle_3.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
AD_Idle_3.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at the noise outside.

AD_Idle_4.speaker: Warrior Nrog
AD_Idle_4.text: Aw, c'mon now. They're just 'avin a bit o' fun.
AD_Idle_4.context: NodeContext: Conciliatory, trying to reason with his friend

AD_Idle_1.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
AD_Idle_1.text: Aye - so much fun that those thieves almost got past.

AD_Idle_0.speaker: Warrior Nrog
AD_Idle_0.text: We got 'em though, eh? And once the whelp starts singin' we'll know who sent 'em.
AD_Idle_0.context: NodeContext: Comforting. Second line is said with savour - promimsing his friend they'll have revenge.

AD_Idle_2.speaker: Warrior Trinzas
AD_Idle_2.text: Aye. Might be we'll pay 'em a visit in return. That'll be some real fun.
AD_Idle_2.context: NodeContext: She's won over by her friend's bloodlust - he knows her so well. Line is delivered darkly, promising violence.
